page.title: 09PLAYGROUND GAMES (2) HEMEL
page.content: These games are popular at Barncroft JMI School. {"Pegit"}in which the game is a chase and catch around a circle. The children run and a "catcher" follows. When runners are caught, they also become "catchers". The winner is the last runner to be caught. {"Gregory Green"}in which one team "runs" and the other "catches". The "catchers" count to 100 before they chase the "runners". When a person is "caught", he stands still, and is "freed" by another team member hitting his hand. The game is over when all "runners" are caught. {"Tin,Tan,Tommy"}in which one person is the "catcher". He counts to 100 while the rest of the players hide. When he finds them he says, "Tin,Tam,Tommy - I see (Name of player)", and he touches home base.
